cs4620.ray1.shader

Class Texture

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs4620.ray1.shader.Texture
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClampTexture, RepeatTexture

    public abstract class Texture
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a simple 2D texture implementation for a shader. It stores and reads from a BufferedImage which is read in from an arbitrary image file on disk.
    Author:
    eschweickart
